mapper.insert: insert into book(name, description, publish_date, author, category, isbn, createtime, updatetime, cover) values (#{name},#{description},#{publishDate},#{author},#{category},#{isbn},#{createtime},#{updatetime},#{cover})
mapper.update: update book set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, publish_date = #{publishDate}, author = #{author}, category = #{category}, isbn = #{isbn}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, cover = #{cover} where id = #{id}
